elements.expression:
filters
| essql 
  query="select \"Application Name\",\"Health Score %\",\"No. of Requests\" , \"No. of Errors\" from (select context.tags.application as \"Application Name\" , (100 - ((count(context.tags.error_code) * 100)/(count(context.tags.correlation_id)))) as \"Health Score %\" , count(context.tags.correlation_id) as \"No. of Requests\" , count(context.tags.error_code) as \"No. of Errors\" from \"apm-*\" where context.tags.correlation_id is not null group by context.tags.application) where \"Health Score %\" < 40  "
| table 
  font={font family="'Open Sans', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" size=14 align="left" color="#000000" weight="bold" underline=false italic=false} showHeader=true perPage=10 paginate=true
| render containerStyle={containerStyle border="03px outset "}

filters
| essql 
  query="SELECT err , plat from(select (a*100/b) as err , plat from(select count(context.tags.application) as b, count(context.tags.error_code) as a , context.tags.platform as plat from \"apm-*\" where context.tags.application is not null group by context.tags.application , context.tags.platform)) where err > 60"
| pointseries x="size(err)" y="plat" color="size(err)"
| plot defaultStyle={seriesStyle bars=0.75 horizontalBars=true color="#fd7643"} legend=false 
  font={font family="'Open Sans', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" size=14 align="right" color="#000000" weight="bold" underline=false italic=false}
| render

filters
| demodata
| markdown "### Platforms with poor health
" "" 
  font={font family="'Open Sans', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" size=14 align="left" color="#fd7643" weight="normal" underline=false italic=false}
| render

filters
| demodata
| markdown "### Applications with poor health" 
  font={font family="'Open Sans', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" size=14 align="left" color="#fd7643" weight="normal" underline=false italic=false}
| render

filters
| essql 
  query="SELECT err , plat from(select (a*100/b) as err , plat from(select count(context.tags.application) as b, count(context.tags.error_code) as a , context.tags.platform as plat from \"apm-*\" where context.tags.application is not null group by context.tags.application , context.tags.platform)) where err > 60"
| pointseries x="plat" y="size(err)" color="size(err)"
| plot defaultStyle={seriesStyle bars=0.75 color="#FF0000"} legend=false 
  font={font family="'Open Sans', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" size=14 align="left" color="#000000" weight="normal" underline=false italic=false}
| render

filters
| essql 
  query="SELECT err , plat from(select (a*100/b) as err , plat from(select count(context.tags.application) as b, count(context.tags.error_code) as a , context.tags.platform as plat from \"apm-*\" where context.tags.application is not null group by context.tags.application , context.tags.platform)) where err > 40 and err < 60"
| pointseries x="plat" y="size(err)" color="size(err)"
| plot defaultStyle={seriesStyle bars=0.75 color="#FFBF00"} legend=false 
  font={font family="'Open Sans', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" size=14 align="left" color="#000000" weight="normal" underline=false italic=false}
| render

filters
| essql 
  query="select \"Application Name\",\"Health Score %\",\"No. of Requests\" , \"No. of Errors\" from (select context.tags.application as \"Application Name\" , (100 - ((count(context.tags.error_code) * 100)/(count(context.tags.correlation_id)))) as \"Health Score %\" , count(context.tags.correlation_id) as \"No. of Requests\" , count(context.tags.error_code) as \"No. of Errors\" from \"apm-*\" where context.tags.correlation_id is not null group by context.tags.application) where \"Health Score %\" < 60 and  \"Health Score %\" > 40"
| table 
  font={font family="'Open Sans', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" size=14 align="left" color="#000000" weight="bold" underline=false italic=false} showHeader=true perPage=10 paginate=true
| render containerStyle={containerStyle border="03px outset "} css=".disabled svg.euiIcon euiIcon--medium euiIcon--subdued {
display: none;}

"

timefilterControl compact=true column="@timestamp"
| render containerStyle={containerStyle backgroundColor="rgba(255,255,255,0)"}
